alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 19 at 5:24PM MST until March 21 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST MONDAY NIGHT ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches, with 12 to 18 inches above 8500 feet on the Kaibab Plateau. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph on Monday. * WHERE...Areas above 7000 feet near Jacob Lake and North Rim. * WHEN...Until midnight MST Monday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Additional snow forecast from 5 PM Today to midnight Monday Night: Jacob Lake 7 to 11 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
